title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and library for running Llama 2, Code Llama, and other large language models locally with GPU/CPU acceleration.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server; chat, generate, pull, and manage models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and asyncio bindings for Ollama; drop-in replacement for OpenAI calls.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community adapter that wraps Ollama models for chains, agents, and RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (chat UI, model manager, RAG, multi-user) that proxies to any Ollama instance.

title: ollama-chroma
summary: Template repo showing how to combine Ollama embeddings with Chroma vector DB for local RAG.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Minimal Streamlit chatbot that uses Ollama for both embeddings and generation with local documents.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI with syntax highlighting, conversation history, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Visual Studio Code extension that brings Ollama models into the editor as a GitHub-Copilot-like assistant.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama4j
summary: Native Java/Kotlin client for Ollama exposing synchronous, reactive, and Spring-Boot starters.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community .NET SDK for Ollama supporting .NET 6+ and ASP.NET Core integration.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Lightweight Rust crate wrapping Ollama’s REST API with tokio and serde.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Cross-platform desktop app (Tauri + React) for chatting with Ollama models without browser.

title: ollama-telegram-bot
summary: Telegram bot server (Node.js) that forwards group or private messages to a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-nest
summary: NestJS module providing decorators and services to inject Ollama models into TypeScript backends.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that streams Ollama responses into threads with slash commands and model switching.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI pipelines that caches and pre-pulls Ollama models inside containers.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community registry of custom Modelfiles (Llava, Mistral, CodeLlama fine-tunes) ready to pull.
